bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: St. Joseph's Catholic Church was the first Catholic church in Richmond, Virginia, established to serve the African-American community. It is in the same location as St. Peter's Catholic Church, 800 East Grace Street, Richmond, Virginia.
